reviewText: I enjoyed the play and I love to see Leon in anything because he is such a phenomenal and talented actor.
I LOVED THE MOVIE, IT WAS WORTH BUYING AND ANYTHING WIT LEON IN IT IS WORTH GETTING HES AN AWSUME ACTOR AND IT WAS A GOOD CAST
Different from what I thought it would be.  It was more like a play and I was thinking a movie.  It was good.  I liked the actor (Leon).
A pretty good play.  Leon played a different role than what I am used to him playing, but all in all it was a good play.

This uplifting TV movie is a great movie about love, trust and marriage.  The actors Leon from the Temptations, Essence Atkins from Half and Half, Vanessa Simmons from Run's house, JoMarie Payton from Family Matters, Marcus T. gray and Antwan Tanner makes a great cast.  My daughter and I love this and all other GMC/UP TV movies/plays.
Very good realistic acting by actors and actresses. I hope to see more movies from the creators of this movie.
good movie! Can watch it over and over!
Happy!
Good Play I really enjoy the play.
Great movie !
Good movie

This movie really took me for a loop. Just when my wife and I thought this movie was predictable as a lot of others like weve seen, they fooled us! It had a really good twist and overall, it was great.

This is a Sunday treat!  A kick back relax and put a dvd in movie.  Me and my husband enjoyed it.  We actually rented from Redbox on vacation with another couple. It really opened the doors on a great conversation.  I had to buy it. I highly recommend!

This film discusses issues of trust and self image in life and relationships. I thought that the men in this film were a bit stiff. They didn't really seem interested in their women and these were some cuties. It's a clean film. it would be rated PG. Leon is as cool as ever. Essence is cute as usual and plays her part well. Recommended for fans of romantic comedies.
Wonderful message in the story,Will share with friends short but you get the point I must say it was good.

This play is really starting from the beginning of one relationship that truly helps a person to know them selves before starting something what God had created his/her path of love. God is love and sometime friend and family members help you along the way with the love they have within for that person to be happy in life. God is love and only God's can guide you to your destiny of love.
